ResearchProjectDef.label: neutrobug
ResearchProjectDef.description: Delve into tribal lore to learn the secrets of tribal neutrobugs - human parasites which burrow into the brain. Neutrobugs, after consuming the brain, turn into small amounts of neutroamine and more neutrobugs.

ResearchProjectDef.label: neutrobrew caskets
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to ferment corpses and plants to get low amounts of neutroamine.

ResearchProjectDef.label: neutroamine synthesis
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research ways into inefficiently synthesizing neutroamine from chemfuel.

ResearchProjectDef.label: neutrogenesis mutagen
ResearchProjectDef.description: Investigate the neutrobug and turn native animals (or native people) into specialized neutroamine factories.
